Title: Establishes a tax credit for direct support professionals and direct care workers
Summary: Establishes a tax credit for individuals who serve or are employed as a direct support professional, or direct care worker, up to five thousand dollars for taxpayers who make less than fifty thousand dollars and phased out for individuals who make over one hundred thousand dollars.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing a tax credit for direct support professionals and direct care workers
